page.title: 12HORNSEA GAMES - WEMBLEY
page.content:
All you need are two items of clothing to form a goal and a small ball. The number of players you need is between three and ten.
The rules are that you are not allowed to kick or push your opponents but you have to tackle fairly. To do this you take the ball from your opponent without making much body contact.
The object of the game is to kick the ball between the two items of clothing. You must not touch the ball with your hands unless you are the "goalie".
A "goalie" is a person who stands between the items of clothing and tries not to let the ball past him. He can use any part of his body to stop the ball. Richard Worley
